info.name: Email Viewer
info.summary: View the contents of an .eml or .msg file
info.description: This application integrates the [email-to-pdf-converter](https://github.com/nickrussler/email-to-pdf-converter) into Nextcloud. Using this application users can view their eml or .msg file files in the mail app without the need to download the file.
info.author: Hamza Mahjoubi
